mph.beans.sessions

Interface ArtifactViewerFunctionalities

  • All Superinterfaces:
    UserEditingFunctionalities
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicUserManagerInterface, ProfessorManagerRemote, StudentManagerRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProfessorManager, StudentManager

    interface ArtifactViewerFunctionalities
extends UserEditingFunctionalities
    This interface provides methods to get information about artifacts and to download them.
    It extends UserEditingFunctionalities.

    • Method Detail

      • getArtifact

        ArtifactIdDTO getArtifact(DeliverableIdDTO theDeliverableId,
                        TeamIdDTO theTeamIdDTO)
                          throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                 UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theDeliverableId - the id of the deliverable referred by the artifact
        theTeamIdDTO - the id of the team which delivered the artifact
        Returns:
        the id of the artifact delivered by the team for the deliverable given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the arguments is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

      • getArtifactSetByDeliverable

        java.util.Set<ArtifactIdDTO> getArtifactSetByDeliverable(DeliverableIdDTO theDeliverableId)
                                                         throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                                                UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theDeliverableId - the id of the project deliverable
        Returns:
        a set of artifacts corresponding to the deliverable given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the arguments is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

      • getArtifactSetByTeam

        java.util.Set<ArtifactIdDTO> getArtifactSetByTeam(TeamIdDTO theTeamId)
                                                  throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                                         UserNotLoggedInException
        Parameters:
        theTeamId - the id of the project team
        Returns:
        a set of artifacts delivered by the team given as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if one of the arguments is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in

      • downloadArtifact

        IncomingFileDTO downloadArtifact(ArtifactIdDTO theArtifactId)
                                 throws InvalidArgumentException,
                                        UserNotLoggedInException,
                                        DownloadErrorException
        Download the artifact given as parameter
        Parameters:
        theArtifactId - the id of the artifact to be downloaded
        Returns:
        the DTO containing the file
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if the argument is not valid
        UserNotLoggedInException - if the user is not logged in
        DownloadErrorException - if an error occurs during the download of the file

        Returns:
